arts.ttl: Wrexham vs Charlton Athletic rivalry stance clear after Nathan Jones' 'circus' jibe
arts.sum: Charlton boss Nathan Jones insists he has no ill feeling towards Wrexham after invoking the ire of the club's fans during their League One promotion battle last season

arts.ttl: Wrexham vs Charlton predictions: Addicks may have met their match
arts.sum: Rivals in the third tier last season, Wrexham and Charlton are making decent strides in the Championship now and Aaron Ashley feels the Red Dragons can edge a low-scoring affair in Wales.
Phil Parkinson admits there is an "edge" between Wrexham and Charlton Athletic as a result of the battles they had in League One last season.

arts.ttl: Wrexham vs Charlton - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Wrexham and Charlton Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
